Ext button.Button Example

Tags:

  • Ext JS
  • Ext JS 4.0.7
  • Ext.Button
  • Ext.button.Button
  • button
  • handler
[example]

See Also:

  • Ext.button.Button Documentation
© 2012 Sencha Inc. 
/*global Ext:false */
Ext.onReady(function () {
    Ext.create('Ext.Button', {
        text: 'Click me',
        renderTo: Ext.getBody(),
        handler: function () {
            alert('You clicked the button!');
        }
    });
});
